name: PausePoint
signal_source: Impulse control research shows users need 'pause points before making decisions' and value 'external reminders such as alarms, sticky notes'
description: Micro-intervention app that creates thoughtful pauses before important decisions and purchases
target_user: People who make impulsive decisions and want simple tools to pause and reflect without complex meditation practices
pain_point_evidence: Users find value in 'brief pause allows you to collect your thoughts and assess the situation logically' and '10-minute rule' interventions
differentiation: Micro-interventions vs. full meditation apps, focuses on decision moments rather than general mindfulness
subscription_fit: Premium includes custom triggers, detailed analytics, and personalized reflection prompts

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic pauses, premium for advanced triggers and analytics
